keyword: calories in strawberry banana smoothie mcdonalds
title: Calories in McDonald's Strawberry Banana Smoothie
meta_description: Discover calories in strawberry banana smoothie mcdonalds, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and serving size details for easy tracking.
h1: Calories in McDonald's Strawberry Banana Smoothie
assumptions: Small size (16 fl oz) serving, made with strawberry and banana puree, low-fat yogurt, and natural flavors; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, location, customizations, and preparation; check McDonald's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A small McDonald's strawberry banana smoothie has ~250 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Upgrade to medium size (21 fl oz)

faqs.q: How many calories in a small strawberry banana smoothie mcdonalds?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal for the small (16 fl oz) size.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in McDonald's strawberry banana smoothie?
faqs.a: Approximately 58 g carbs, including 49 g sugars, per small serving.

faqs.q: Is there protein in strawberry banana smoothie mcdonalds?
faqs.a: Yes, about 3 g protein from the yogurt base in a small smoothie.

faqs.q: How does the large size compare in calories?
faqs.a: A large (32 fl oz) has around 450 kcal, nearly double the small.
Yes, only 1 g total fat per small strawberry banana smoothie.
